hits.Title: Rummikub
hits.Description: The original Rummikub is one of the most popular family games in the world.The unique combination of tactical thinking, luck and tense competition has made this classic family game into one of the most successful games for the past 70 years! hits.Title: Politon
hits.Description: Politon is a turn-based strategy game with easy-to-understand mechanics and satisfying visuals. If you want to test your strategical logic against enemies of different numbers and difficulty levels, Politon offers a variety of hex-based maps with various terrains. You'll need to manage your economy while expanding your territories and defend your region against rival invasions.
hits.Instructions: Point and click on tiles to select the region you want to manage. Then click on building cards to select which units you want to recruit. Expand your regions by moving units around and defeat your enemies.
hits.Key Features: The game features four types of units, three building types, and hex grid maps waiting to be conquered. The unit types are arranged from weakest to strongest: Peasant, Militia, Baron, and Knight. Each hex grid allows one unit or building to be placed, and each unit has one movement point per turn. To afford the cost of units and their maintenance, you must expand your territory and strengthen your economy by building Farms. You can opt to place Outposts or Watchtowers to form defensive lines. Enhance your economy by collecting resources from the terrain or strategically spreading your influence by waiting for a few turns. The joy of victory lies in eliminating all your enemies.

hits.Title: The Walking Deadblocks
hits.Description: A fast-paced, cooperative survival game where players battle relentless waves of zombies across dynamic day-night cycles. Survive as long as possible by managing resources, unlocking new maps, and utilizing unique character abilities. Nights bring increased danger with randomized enemy spawns, challenging players to strategize using generators and lights to stay alive.
hits.Instructions:

•	Co-op Mode:
          o	Player 1:
                 	Movement: Arrow keys
                 	Shooting: L
                 	Weapon Switching: Use "," and "."
          o	Player 2:
                 	Movement: W, A, S, D

                 	Weapon Switching: Use Q and E
hits.Key Features:
The game is a single-player and co-op PvE shooter. It is a survival game featuring a wave system and a dynamic day/night cycle. Each wave incorporates a looping 24-hour system with five distinct times of day, where enemy spawn rates vary. Mornings are easier, while nights introduce randomized enemy spawns for added tension.

There are three types of enemies:

Zombies: Slow, small melee enemies with low damage.
Infectious: Ranged enemies with area-of-effect attacks.
Chargers: Large, fast melee enemies that deal high damage.
Players can choose from four distinct characters, each with unique abilities:

Wrench: Deploys a turret.
Glimmer: Deploys a light tower.
Dash: Deploys an electric trap that slows down enemies.
Sentinel: Deploys a shield.

Common items include seven types of weapons and four types of deployables:

Weapons: Pistol, Uzi, Shotgun, Rocket Launcher, Sniper Rifle, Flamethrower, Grenade Launcher 
Deployables:Wall, Barrel, C4, Mines.

The game features three different maps. One map is free to play, while the other two must be unlocked by collecting points earned in the currently accessible maps. Points are accumulated by defeating enemies.

hits.Instructions:
The goal is to find and mark all the mines hidden under the green squares. This is done by clicking on the squares to open them. Each square will have:
1) A mine, and if you click on it you'll lose the game.
2) A number, which tells you how many of its adjacent squares have mines in them.
3) Nothing. In this case you know that none of the adjacent squares have mines, and they will be automatically opened as well.
Music by Oki ajah, sfx by opengameart.org. Thanks to alextro for sharing the code!
